name: tm70
effect: Teaches Flash to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flash to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target’s accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target’s accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.
